# rux-breadcrumb



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot          | Description                                |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| `"(default)"` | place breadcrumb-items in the default slot |


## Shadow Parts

| Part          | Description                                      |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| `"base"`      | the ordered list containing the breadcrumb-items |
| `"container"` | the nav element containing the breadcrumb list   |
